modName: Bat File With All Perks All Skills 100 All Shouts All Spells Ect
summary: everything needed to be the best player in the game
descriptionHtml: all the shouts, all the spells, all the perks, all the skills are 100 and all you do is open up the dev console and type in \"bat everyperk\" and it will load everything.  You will also get lots of gold with this.  I took the codes off of http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim).  If you want any special bat files let me know and im working on a new new game save that will have the game complete and if you would like to leave recomendation ill look foward to makeing those files for you just post in the coments section.
author: cdux1995
